channel.title: Shops
channel.description: ok im adding shops onto my server and i need to know how i find out what number my shop is like :(e.g.) [code]shop = 40[/code] now how do i figure that out?

item.title: Shops

ok i see but than i want to edit a shop so i put some more item ids and the ammout so i compiled went fine thasn ran it and it cam up with somthing and it was becuase of what i added to the shops what did i do wrong?[br][size=1]Posted on: March 28, 2007, 08:55:52 PM[/size][hr]anyone gonna help me? plz do i will be very happy! tell you what ill be a happy hippo and so will u cuase if u help u will become an admin on my server =)
